content.description: Carmen consumes both entertainment and medical care. For Carmen, entertainment is a normal good, and the income elasticity of her demand for medical care is zero.
content.question: If Carmenâ€™s income increases, which of the following will be the immediate impact on her consumption?

choices.label:
Entertainment: Increase; Medical care: Increase

Entertainment
 Medical care

Increase
 Increase

Entertainment
 Medical care

Increase
 No change

Entertainment
 Medical care

No change
 Increase

content.answer:
Entertainment
 Medical care

Increase
 No change

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
